Material used.Description: Protein stability and solubility were assessed using recombinant DJ-1 variants in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: E163K showed no significant differences in protein stability or solubility compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein stability/solubility within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein stability/solubility deviating by more than 20% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Oxidative stress resistance was tested using HEK293 cells expressing E163K or wild-type DJ-1.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Reduced protective capacity against oxidative stress
Readout description.Result Description: E163K showed significantly reduced ability to protect cells from oxidative stress compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability above 80% under oxidative stress.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability below 50% under oxidative stress.

Material used.Description: Subcellular localization of E163K and wild-type DJ-1 was analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: E163K showed reduced mitochondrial localization compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial localization above 70% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial localization below 50% of wild-type levels.
